content.question: Which of the following statements best captures a paradox presented in the sixth stanza (lines 21-24) ?

choices.label: The speaker depicts the cedar and pine trees as both inanimate entities and sentient beings.
The speaker feels nature’s companionship as well as its enigmatic quality.
The speaker enjoys being isolated yet longs for human interaction.
The speaker experiences freedom as a feeling that is both fleeting and enduring.

content.answer: The speaker feels nature’s companionship as well as its enigmatic quality.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
